examples.text: Goodnight for me as I am a MAICHARD fan.?❤️❤️❤️
Goodnight for me as I am a MAICHARD fan.?❤️❤️❤️

relations.target: sleep=00014735-v (be asleep);02707305-v (be able to accommodate for sleeping; \""This tent sleeps six people\"");13986101-n (euphemisms for death (based on an analogy between lying in a bed and in a tomb); \""she was laid to rest beside her husband\""; \""they had to put their family pet to sleep\"");14048353-n (a natural and periodic state of rest during which consciousness of the world is suspended; \""he didn't get enough sleep last night\""; \""calm as a child in dreamless slumber\"");14049464-n (a torpid state resembling deep sleep);15298612-n (a period of time spent sleeping; \""he felt better after a little sleep\""; \""there wasn't time for a nap\""

evening=15191509-n (the latter part of the day (the period of decreasing daylight from late afternoon until nightfall); \""he enjoyed the evening light across the lake\"");15192953-n (the early part of night (from dinner until bedtime) spent in a special way; \""an evening at the opera\"");15292923-n (a later concluding time period; \""it was the evening of the Roman Empire\""

farewell=00053917-n (the act of departing politely; \""he disliked long farewells\""; \""he took his leave\""; \""parting is such sweet sorrow\"");06641899-n (an acknowledgment or expression of goodwill at parting

senses.definition: A farewell said in the evening or before going to sleep.
